Description: *Excellent Condition* LISTING UPDATE!!! I've swapped the original case to my prized Paisley hard case. They don't make them nicer than this. They retail alone for $300.00. Please see the last 3 photos for it. I felt that such an amazing Custom 24 such as this one deserved it. I purchased the case and have yet to use it because of how nice it is. If you want the original I'll swap it back to that but if not mentioned you will automatically receive the upgraded case.In my listings if a guitar or case has any issues I will do my best to make a note of it: I listed the guitar as excellent condition because there is one minor blemish that I noticed. I would best describe it as a little fogging on the left side of the fretboard. Because it's on the very side it's near impossible to see. Please see the photo attached, I circled that area. Please double check all of the photos. If you see something, I may have overlooked it but I photographed every inch and she looked beautiful to me. The case shows a little sign of wear, just from being a case. Please do not mistake objects in the background reflected off of the guitar as blemishes. Please feel free to ask me about any photo! The bridge is currently set up as a PRS version of a Stratocaster style blocked bridge which can be easily undone by performing a normal "set up" should you choose to restore the normal function of the tremolo bridgeFeatures: Custom 24Makena Blue FinishFigured Maple "10 Top"Mahogany NeckPattern Thin CarveEast Indian Rosewood FretboardTremolo BridgeNickel HardwareBird Inlays57/08 PickupsLocking Tuners5-Way Blade Switch7.54lbsIncludes: 1 PRS guitar, case candy, COA and it's PRS hardshell case. Plays PERFECTLY with no problems.
Title: 2013 PRS Custom 24 "10 Top" Makena Blue
